name: Road Race Ultimate
description:
Here is a small game composed of four different playable levels in any order. Drive at full speed in the middle of traffic avoiding the cars in your path, score maximum points and build a glorious reputation.

You can find your highest score for each level on the road map.
I clarify that the car assets are not mine.
Find the music here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMGrzUbTaPw-Rfx1dxUtc4Q
Find the sound effects here: https://www.sound-fishing.net/
In a future update I plan to change the font of the texts, add additional game levels and also add a cosmetic system obtainable with IG money.

Visit my first game on Construct: https://www.construct.net/en/free-online-games/balle-chambre-16193/play

Use the left mouse click to move around the menus.
Use arrow keys to drive the car.

Report me any bugs.

GL & HF
